remarks: The cyclic group generated by ` A ` is the smallest subgroup containing ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
cycsubg.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
cycsubg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
cycsubg.f $e |- F = ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x .x. A ) ) $.
cycsubg $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ran F = |^| { s e. ( SubGrp ` G ) | A e. s } ) $.
$d .x. x $.
$d A s x $.
$d F s $.
$d G s x $.
$d X x $.
